name: Junior The Chicken
description:
• Collect all the Golden Eggs
  • Throw an Egg to pass to the next generation
  • Become the Chicken Parkour Master

Credit:

  • Calvin Fredrick
  • Louis-Serge Gagné
  • Yzza Safieddine

  • Sofia Zhukova
  • Celian Grangeot

Programmer

Made in Montréal ISART DIGITAL's Game Week 2021 in 4 days. The theme was Generations.
